channel.title: CVE Feed for Hometory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hometory -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-26644|2024-08-03T20:26:25.648Z -- hometory -- mangboard%20wp%20basic
item.description: SQL-Injection vulnerability caused by the lack of verification of input values for the table name of DB used by the Mangboard bulletin board. A remote attacker can use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the server where the bulletin board is running.

item.title: CVE-2024-30431|2024-06-04T17:38:51.703Z -- hometory -- mang%20board%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hometory Mang Board WP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mang Board WP: from n/a through 1.8.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30431|2024-08-02T01:32:07.522Z -- hometory -- mang%20board%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hometory Mang Board WP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mang Board WP: from n/a through 1.8.0.
